name: 12-to-6 Shift
description:
My game jam team needs me, and I’m stuck on this lousy 12-6 pizza delivery shift. But I’ve got an idea.

I found this dinky robot in my garage. Always gets stuck in a loop, but it’ll have to do. I’m going to program it to run my delivery routes for me.

I just have to drag the instructional chips into the control console to program the robot’s movement and hit Play (⏵)!

The Tools:
Game Engine: Unity / C# 

Artwork: Affinity Designer
Music: Audacity
Audio: as3sfxr, Zapsplat.com

The Team:
Ben Sulzinsky
Robert Buckley
Josh Gardos
